title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A sapling needs special care and nourishment to grow to its full potential. Take a quiet moment to contemplate the works in progress that could benefit from extra attention in your life. There might be one particular project that has all the hallmarks of a winner. Think about the actions you can take to help it along, or better yet, make a definitive plan and execute it to the letter. Tender nurturing and unwavering dedication have been known to work miracles time and again. Turn a possibility into a reality with your sheer determination and love. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
